name: Mop Zone
description:
By Ryan G. and Anderson S.

Have you ever been craving to clean another room after cleaning your own room?
Or wanted to experience having a flooded basement? We have it all!
Welcome to Mop Zone, where your inner cleaning freak goes WILD!!
Featuring such exciting gameplay, that you can’t seem to get enough of: cleaning!
Perhaps this is your nanny training routine since COVID?This game is a single player “relaxing” experience, where the player tries to maintain at least 60% (or so) cleanliness, while dirt magically appear on your property and maybe a bug or two. (be grateful this isn’t real life or else it would be much worse).

Controls: a mouse/trackpad is all you need!

Credits:
- Background music belongs to Kevin Maclead
developers: NYU Game Center - High School Programs
